## [MapBiomas Trinational Atlantic Forest](https://bosqueatlantico.mapbiomas.org/es)

- Project Collaborator “MapBiomas Trinational Atlantic Forest”. Created as a collaborative network of specialists from Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay, in topics such as land use, satellite remote sensing, GIS and programming.
- From 2019 to present.
- I use google earth engine to collect samples of different landuse or landcover.
- I participate in successive discussions and improvements in the MapBiomas versions or collections and in the applied methods.
